creditline: Gift of funds from Michael Snow
description: view through a TV camera of a band performing; 4 men playing guitars, one woman at center, drummer in background; drawings of airplanes behind band
inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

On back in pencil: [AIRPLANE/KPIX-5/S.F/VAN NESS 66], [30/16/3 (upside down)]
markings: on back in purple ink: [From the Personal/Collection of Photographer/Jim Smircich/PUBLICATION RIGHTS RESERVED/SAN FRANCISCO]
signed: on back LR in pencil: [James Smircich]
title: Jefferson Airplane, KPIX, San Francisco
